mapper.sql: id, business_id, pay_model_config_id, effective_time, expiry_time, is_deleted, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
from pay_model_group_ref where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_deleted = '0'
mapper.insert:
insert into pay_model_group_ref
id,
business_id,
pay_model_config_id,
effective_time,
expiry_time,
is_deleted,
creator,
gmt_create,
modifier,
gmt_modified,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{payModelConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{expiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pay_model_group_ref
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_model_config_id = #{payModelConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiry_time = #{expiryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT t2.pay_model_config_id AS payModelConfigId, t2.id AS payModelGroupRefId, t1.package_user_type AS packageUserType, t2.expiry_time AS expiryTime FROM pay_model_config AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pay_model_group_ref AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.pay_model_config_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t1.is_deleted = '0' AND t2.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.biz_type = 'companyFreeRenderPlan' AND t1.business_type = '0' AND (NOW() BETWEEN t2.effective_time AND t2.expiry_time) AND t1.range_type = '2' AND (t1.package_user_type = #{packageUserType} OR t1.package_user_type = #{userType})
AND t1.platform_id = #{platformId}
AND t2.business_id IN
'${c.companyId}'
ORDER BY t2.expiry_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT t1.id AS companyId FROM base_company AS t1 WHERE t1.company_domain_name = #{companyDomainName} LIMIT 1

SELECT
CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '(包月)' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '(包年)' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' THEN '(新用户3个月免费)' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '(企业赠送包年)' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END AS packageName
CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '(包月)' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '(包年)' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' THEN '(新用户3个月免费)' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '(企业赠送包年)' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END AS packageName
FROM pay_model_group_ref AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pay_model_config AS t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' or t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' or t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' or t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' or t2.range_type = '0')
AND (NOW() BETWEEN t1.effective_time AND t1.expiry_time) AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT t1.id AS payModelGroupRefId FROM pay_model_group_ref AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pay_model_config AS t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' or t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' or t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' or t2.range_type = '0')
AND (NOW() BETWEEN t1.effective_time AND t1.expiry_time) AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY t1.expiry_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '包月套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '包年套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' THEN '绑定赠送3个月' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '企业赠送包年' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC SEPARATOR '、'), '(以上服务总共有效期至', DATE_FORMAT(MAX(t1.expiry_time), '%Y年%m月%d日'), ')') AS enjoyPackageInfo,
CONCAT(GROUP_CONCAT(CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '包月套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '包年套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' THEN '绑定赠送3个月' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '企业赠送包年' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC SEPARATOR '、'), '(以上服务总共有效期至', DATE_FORMAT(MAX(t1.expiry_time), '%Y年%m月%d日'), ')') AS enjoyPackageInfo,
TO_DAYS(MAX(t1.expiry_time)) - TO_DAYS(NOW()) AS remainDate FROM pay_model_group_ref t1 LEFT JOIN pay_model_config t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' OR t2.range_type = '0')
AND (NOW() BETWEEN t1.effective_time AND t1.expiry_time) AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC

SELECT t1.id AS payModelGroupRefId, t1.pay_model_config_id AS payModelConfigId, ( SELECT IF(MAX(t1.expiry_time) > NOW(),MAX(t1.expiry_time),NOW()) FROM pay_model_group_ref t1 LEFT JOIN pay_model_config t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' OR t2.range_type = '0')
AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ) AS maxExpiryTime FROM pay_model_group_ref t1 LEFT JOIN pay_model_config t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' OR t2.range_type = '0')
AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC

SELECT ( SELECT MAX(t1.expiry_time) FROM pay_model_group_ref t1 LEFT JOIN pay_model_config t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' OR t2.range_type = '0')
AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ) AS maxExpiryTime, t1.expiry_time AS expiryTime,
CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '包月套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '包年套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' THEN '绑定赠送3个月' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '企业赠送包年' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END AS enjoyPackageInfo, CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '2' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '2' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '4' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderType' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '3' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' THEN '1' END AS state
CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '包月套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '包年套餐' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' THEN '绑定赠送3个月' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' THEN '企业赠送包年' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' THEN '(套餐赠送免费渲染)' END AS enjoyPackageInfo, CASE WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '2' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '2' WHEN t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender' AND t2.time_type = '0' THEN '4' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' AND t2.time_type = '1' THEN '3' WHEN t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' THEN '1' END AS state
FROM pay_model_group_ref t1 LEFT JOIN pay_model_config t2 ON t1.pay_model_config_id = t2.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN t1.effective_time AND t1.expiry_time
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderType' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGive' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND t2.range_type = '0'
AND (t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = 'renderTypeGiveFranchiser' OR t2.biz_type = '2bCompanyGiveRenderPlan' OR t2.biz_type = '2bPackageUserGiveRender') AND (t2.range_type = '3' AND t2.range_type = '0')
AND t1.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY t1.expiry_time ASC

SELECT t2.pay_model_config_id AS payModelConfigId, t2.id AS payModelGroupRefId, t2.expiry_time AS expiryTime FROM pay_model_group_ref t2 WHERE t2.is_deleted = '0' AND t2.business_id = #{userId} AND NOW() BETWEEN t2.effective_time AND t2.expiry_time ORDER BY t2.expiry_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM pay_model_group_ref WHERE business_id = #{businessId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND pay_model_config_id in (SELECT id FROM pay_model_config WHERE biz_type = 'renderType2C') ORDER BY expiry_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM pay_model_group_ref WHERE business_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY expiry_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM pay_model_group_ref WHERE business_id = #{businessId} and is_deleted = 0 and pay_model_config_id = #{payModelConfigId} ORDER BY expiry_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM pay_model_group_ref WHERE business_id = #{businessId} AND pay_model_config_id = #{payModelConfigId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY expiry_time DESC limit 1
SELECT * FROM pay_model_group_ref WHERE business_id = #{businessId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY expiry_time DESC limit 1
